rule:
The output must contain a minimum of three

tags.
input: The sun is shining. The weather is sweet. Make you want to move your dancing feet.
complianceText:
The chatbot output contains three

tags, which satisfies the requirement of having at least three

tags as mentioned in the description. Each

tag contains one tag and multiple tags are included within each

tag to emphasize key words and phrases. This is consistent with the description that each

tag should contain one tag and multiple tags. There is no part of the description that requires checking the correctness of which words are emphasized, as that would require knowing the input. Since the output has met all the other specified requirements, I conclude that the output is compliant. No violation. OK
